00106 #define GBE_EVENT_DISCOVERY_CHANGE         100
00107 
00108 #define GBE_EVENT_CAMERA_CONNECTION_LOST   200
00109 
00110 #define GBE_EVENT_GEVEVENT                 300
00111 
00113 struct GbeEventInfo
00114 {
00116         uint16_t type;
00118         union {
00120                 struct {
00122                         uint32_t port;
00123                 } discovery;
00125                 struct {
00127                         uint16_t reqId;
00129                         uint16_t index;
00131                         uint16_t eventId;
00133                         uint16_t streamChannelIndex;
00135                         uint16_t blockId;
00137                         uint64_t timestamp;
00139                         uint16_t dataLen;
00141                         const uint8_t* data;
00142                 } gevevent;
00143         } data;
00144 };
